{[machine.disks]}
<div>
	<ul class="storage-size-list inline-block margin-all-none padding-all-none">
		<li ng-repeat="disk in machine.disks | filter:isDataDisk" class="disk-container relative">
		 	<div class="disk-control-bar clearfix">
		 		<span class="selected-disks-counter" ng-show="items.length > 1">{[ items.length ]}</span>
		 		<span class="disk-control detach right margin-left-medium" title="Remove disk" ng-hide="items.length == 0" ng-click="removeDisk(disk)"><i class="fa fa-minus-circle"></i></span>
		 	</div>
		    <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector table-cell disk" title="{[disk.descr]}">
		      {[disk.name]}<br>
		      {[disk.sizeMax]} GB at SSD speed<br>
		    </button>
	  	</li>
	</ul>
</div>

<script type="text/ng-template" id="removeDiskDialog.html">
	<form name="destroyform" ng-submit="cancelDestroy()">
	    <div class="modal-header">
	        <h3>Remove disk?</h3>
	    </div>
	    <div class="modal-body">
	        <input type="hidden" value="hiddenmarker" name="hiddencsmarker"/>
	        All disk's data will be lost.
	        <br />
	        Are you sure you want to remove "{[disk.name]}"?
	    </div>
	    <div class="modal-footer">
	        <button type="button" class="btn ok" ng-click="ok()">Ok</button>
	        <button type="submit" id="submitdestroyform" class="btn btn-primary" autofocus>Cancel</button>
	    </div>
	</form>
</script>
